# knownTimeZoneIdentifiers

**Type Property**

Returns an array of strings listing the identifier of all the time zones known to the system.

## Declaration

```swift
static var knownTimeZoneIdentifiers: [String] { get }
```

## Creating a Time Zone

- **init(secondsFromGMT:)**: Returns a time zone initialized with a specific number of seconds from GMT.
- **abbreviationDictionary**: Returns the mapping of abbreviations to time zone identifiers.

items.description: Returns a time zone initialized with a specific number of seconds from GMT.
